channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 3 Ways To Love Your Partner Through Tough Times, By A Psychologist
item.description: When love feels heavy and patience wears thin, kindness becomes the bridge that keeps two tired hearts connected.

item.title: How Some Owners Use A Household Appliance To Protect Their Cars From Cybertheft
item.description: It’s a cheap solution to a high-tech threat, but some experts warn it may not be worth the risk.
